# Contributing to Pocket Pharmacy project

## Contact

- E-mail: juhasz.bence.zsolt@gmail.com

## Project

- Agile board: https://jbence.atlassian.net/jira/software/projects/PPA/boards/4

### Opening a pull request

- If you are opening a pull request, please use the following branch naming convention:

```
[github-username]/[in case of no ticket pr describe the task] or [ticket number]
```
